rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a foyer that integrates the Vastu principle of positive energy entry.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south wall to maximize natural light, aligned with Vastu for prosperity and relaxation.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Kerala-style kitchen with traditional finishes and ample counter space, strategically placed near the entrance for efficient workflow as per Vastu.

rooms.name: dining_area
rooms.description: Dining space with a central dining table, open concept adjoining the living room to encourage family bonding.

rooms.name: master_bedroom
rooms.description: Master bedroom designed with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and privacy, positioned in the north-west quadrant as per Vastu.

rooms.name: guest_room
rooms.description: Guest bedroom offering a serene space, incorporating natural materials and traditional Kerala craftsmanship.

rooms.name: family_bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with ample storage and a balcony for fresh air, designed in harmony with local traditions.

rooms.name: ensuite_bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom, ensuring convenience and privacy.

rooms.name: storage_room
rooms.description: Dedicated storage room for keeping seasonal and daily-use items.

rooms.name: utility_room
rooms.description: Space allocated for laundry and other utility tasks, designed to be functional yet discreet.

rooms.name: central_courtyard
rooms.description: Open central courtyard acting as a serene focal point of the home with traditional water features and landscaped garden, promoting Vastu principles for natural ventilation and positive energy.

openings.name: front_door
openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with the positive Vastu direction.

openings.name: backdoor
openings.description: Secondary entrance for service access and easy movement between courtyard and utility areas.

openings.name: balcony_access
openings.description: Balcony openings providing access to the central courtyard and additional outdoor space, designed with floor-to-ceiling windows.

vastu_notes: The design incorporates Vastu principles by aligning major openings to auspicious directions (south for main entrance, east for balcony) and placing the courtyard centrally to enhance natural light and air flow. Traditional Kerala elements are integrated with modern functionality.
building_norms: Adheres to local building regulations ensuring safety standards, proper fire exits, and environmental considerations.
